/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling cityscape, viewed from the perspective of a driver on a busy street. The street, teeming with cars, is flanked by towering buildings that reach up towards the clear blue sky. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, are punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green, adding a touch of vibrancy to the otherwise monochrome palette. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban environment. The image is taken from a low angle, which accentuates the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
